title: Enu mADidarEnu hindina
sahitya:
Enu mADidarEnu hindina karmaphala tAnu mADida karma tnagallade


caraNam 1    maraLi maraLi nIrinoLage pokkaru illa hore hottu taleparaTiyAdarilla 
bharadinda bhUmiyanu tODi nODidarilla pararige bAi teredu balkiridarilla
    caraNam 2    balu dEhavanu hrasva mADi bEDidarilla kulagEDi tAnAgi tirugidarilla 
taleyu jaDe gaTTi araNya sEridarilla koLalUdi turugaLanu kAidarilla
    caraNam 3    dhIradavanu biTTu digambarAdaru illa mIri rAvutanAgi hOridarilla 
dhAraNiyoLa pratima purandara viTTalane ArigaLavayya vidhi mIri bALuvare
